info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 9:29PM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with 8 to 12 inches expected in the southern Adirondacks, Helderbergs, central Mohawk Valley, Schoharie Valley and southern Green Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph in the higher terrain areas. * WHERE...Mohawk and Schoharie Valleys, Greater Capital Region, southern Vermont, Lake George and Saratoga Region, and the Southern Adirondacks. * WHEN...Through 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult tonight due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates a half inch to an inch per hour tonight with one inch per hour possible in the southern Adirondacks and southern Green Mountains. Snow may turn moderate again during the day on Sunday with rates up to a half inch to one inch per hour possible where snow bands can redevelop.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
